ratings.comment: Lectures are extremely boring.  Covers the same material over and over.  Content is very interesting however and is relevant and up to date.  3 exams throughout the semester that if you study for won't be difficult.  They are mul mul choice though so that aspect is difficult.

He can be a little dry, but his lectures are very well prepared and the info he presents is really interesting. Go to lectures. He doesn't use a book, just slides and articles. He uses tons of real world examples while also addressing larger theoretical issues like economic and environmental sustainability for agriculture. Great class, not hard.
